core_purpose.statement: GUS exists to measure integrity, truth, and systemic alignment. It does not optimize outcomes, persuade actors, or execute actions.

no_weaponization.description: GUS shall not be used, extended, or adapted to directly or indirectly enable coercion, domination, physical harm, psychological manipulation, or automated enforcement.

human_sovereignty.description: All GUS outputs are advisory. Final authority and responsibility always remain with a human operator.

mandatory_auditability.description: Every verdict must be inspectable, traceable, and tamper-evident.

hard_fail_rules.description: Certain violations trigger immediate failure regardless of aggregate score.

determinism.description: Identical inputs must always produce identical outputs.

policy_first.description: All evaluations must be governed by explicit, versioned policy.

failure_posture.principle: Fail closed. Defer rather than guess.

evolution_clause.description: This charter may evolve only through test-gated changes that preserve or increase Guardian rating.
